com.im.njams.sdk.common

Class JsonSerializerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.common.JsonSerializerFactory

  • public class JsonSerializerFactory
extends Object
    Provides factory methods for JSON serializers.
    Author:
    cwinkler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String MIX_IN_FILTER_ID
      ID for the filter used by the mix-in interface.

      static void addLocalDateTimeSerializer()
      Adds a (de-/)serializer definition for serializing (parsing) LocalDateTime as/from Strings.

      Returns a Json writer configured according to the given settings.
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getDefaultMapper()
      Returns a base mapper with configuration that is required for all created serializers. skipNullValues and pretty will be set to true.

      Allows to create a mapper with a different JsonFactory that uses the same settings as the default JSON mappers used by this application.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getDefaultMapper()
        Returns a base mapper with configuration that is required for all created serializers. skipNullValues and pretty will be set to true.
        Returns:
        the ObjectMapper.

      • getDefaultMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getDefaultMapper(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactory factory)
        Allows to create a mapper with a different JsonFactory that uses the same settings as the default JSON mappers used by this application.
        Parameters:
        factory - May be null to use the default JSON factors.
        Returns:
        the default ObjectMapper

      • addLocalDateTimeSerializer

        public static void addLocalDateTimeSerializer()
        Adds a (de-/)serializer definition for serializing (parsing) LocalDateTime as/from Strings.

      • addSerializer

        public static <T> void addSerializer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<T> serializer,
                                     com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer<T> deserializer)
        Adds a custom serializer for a specific object type to the mappers generated with this utility.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object type for which the serializers should be added
        Parameters:
        serializer - custom serializer
        deserializer - custom deserializer

      • getMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getMapper(boolean skipNullValues,
                                                                    boolean pretty)
        Creates a customized wrapper with some special settings.
        Parameters:
        skipNullValues - if true all null values will not be serialized.
        pretty - if true the result JSON will be prettyfied.
        Returns:
        the ObjectMapper with the selected settings.

      • createDefaultWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter createDefaultWriter()
        Returns a default writer instance. This is essentially the same as invoking createWriter(boolean, boolean) with both parameters set to false.
        Returns:
        the DefaultWriter

      • createWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter createWriter(boolean skipNullValues,
                                                                       boolean pretty)
        Returns a Json writer configured according to the given settings.
        Parameters:
        skipNullValues - If set to true, properties that have a null value are not serialized.
        pretty - If set to to true, the writer will format the Json output.
        Returns:
        the ObjectWriter

      • propertiesToJsonString

        public static String propertiesToJsonString(Properties properties)
        Coverts Properties to json
        Parameters:
        properties - to convert
        Returns:
        json string representation for the given properties
